pageProduct.name: Palmers Coconut Oil Hydrating Facial Sheet Mask 20ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Coconut Oil Coconut Water Sheet Mask combines naturally skin-friendly coconut water, hyaluronic acid and chamomile, to drench skin in hydration for a radiant, healthy looking glow.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children.

Common Uses

Sheet mask delivery system allows for optimal penetration of active ingredients. Single use. 100% cotton sheet. Hypoallergenic. Dermatologist Tested.

Ingredients

Water, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Xanthan Gum, Glycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (and) Potassium Sorbate (and) Sodium Benzoate (and) Citric Acid, , Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Water, Polyglyceryl-10 Oleate, Tocopherols (Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil (and) Gardenia Tahitensis Flower Extract, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Fragrance (Parfum), Panthenol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract. Urea, Trehalose, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium PCA, Polyquaternium-51, Phenoxyethanol, Coumarin.

Directions

Unfold mask and place onto clean, dry skin, smoothing the edges to the contours of the face. Relax for 10 minutes. Remove mask. Massage remaining product into the skin.
